Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user signs into your sanctioned apps from a risky IP address.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Logon from a Risky IP Address
Query: sourcetype="m365-threat_management" eventsource="SecurityComplianceCenter" eventname="Log on from a risky IP address" status="success"
